entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Surface the `_tabString` Field in `IndentedTextWriter` #68726
  • CI Failure: System.Memory tests failing with seg fault #68722
  • Could not load file or assembly 'NLog.Web.AspNetCore, Version=4.0.0.0' #68720
  • CI Failure: Build Browser wasm Linux Release LibraryTests #68718
  • Build of libraries fails in VS #68716
  • Helix tests failing during reporting with Permission Denied on run.py.log #68715
  • NativeAOT: exception.StackTrace() does not show line numbers #68714
  • Consider adding more tests for the Equals instance method for the various vector types #68710
  • Unsafe.AsRef cannot be used with ref structs #68709
  • Blazor Publish Emscripten Deadlocked #68708
    7.0.0
  • Support running the libraries tests with `UseSystemResourceKeys=true` #68707
  • [API Proposal]: (Re)introduce WeakAttribute that makes a field behave as if it were a WeakReference. #68702
  • ApiCompat errors when building System.Runtime inside Visual Studio #68699
    7.0.0
  • System.Private.CoreLib's fast up-to-date check is broken #68698
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.Public_Interop_ExactVersion_Success(uri: \"https://www.litespeedtech.com/\") #68692
  • Test failure tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #68690
  • NativeAOT doesnt produce Requires warnings in Generics #68688

Closed

  • [wasm] blazor_scenarios for perf are not working completely #67323
    7.0.0
  • Regressions from simple forward substitution pass #64989
    7.0.0
  • Hello world sample fail native AOT #68711
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\nullabletypes\\castclassvaluetype_ro\\castclassvaluetype_ro.cmd #68451
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add high precision maths functions like log1p #64184
  • [API Proposal/Question]: IFloatingPoint<TSelf> is totally base 2 IEEE 1985 oriented. We also need the basics for base10/decimal and other rational/fraction/real like numbers #62293
  • FileSystemEventArgs constructor throws with empty directory value #68566
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Vector2.Equals doesn't use float.Equals in Equals implementation #58853
    7.0.0
  • crossgen: provide log (of not compiled methods) #6640
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: Using JsonStringEnumConverter, after changing CurrentCulture to "sv-SE", enums with unknown negative values serialize strangely, and cannot be deserialized. #68600
    7.0.0
  • API Proposal: File.ReadLinesAsync #2214
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add new Task() constructors to be consistent with Task.Run() #68637
  • Test failure System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollectorTests.TestHandleCollector #66571

PullRequests

Created

  • Add document describing how to disable tests #68727
  • JIT: fix loop recognition in OSR PGO methods #68725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers version #68724
    area-Meta
  • Clean up some debug-only code in Regex #68721
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add support for LLVM 14.x #68719
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Removal of IBC infrastructure #68717
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Bump Intellisense package to Preview 3 #68713
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68706
    area-System.Globalization
  • Reduce allocation in Process.GetProcessesByName #68705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Pass UseStrongCrypto to server-side TLS #68704
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Fix static closed delegate fnptr crash. #68701
    area-Interop-mono
  • Test PR for #68366 #68700
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [WIP] wasm app host #68696
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Relax argument checks on pinned GCHandles #68694
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Delete some unused wrappers for registry operations #68689
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Ensure the generic math APIs are publicly exposed on nint/nuint where relevant #68693
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Fixed and Sliding Window RateLimiters + PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #68695
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix declaration hiding in host #68684
    area-Host
  • Fix default install location used when running under x64 emulation on Windows arm64. #68671
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Allow empty directory values in FileSystemEventArgs/RenamedEventArgs ctors #68582
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Ensure the Equals instance method for the various vector types is correct #68691
    area-System.Numerics
  • Hoist the nullchecks for 'this' object #68588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox - remove item from commands_received #68618
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure decimal.TryWriteSignificandLittleEndian correctly takes endianness into account #68599
    area-System.Runtime
  • BuildID parameter correction #68681
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix build and analyzer errors in amd64 table gen #68697
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix JsonStringEnumConverter bug concerning handling of negative values in changing cultures #68663
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1743544 #68680
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Migrate rest of the JS interop functions to out params #68642
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] More LLVM refactoring to support LLVM 14.x. #68426
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Ensure TestHandleCollector has enough memory pressure to trigger #68652
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Fix the TypeConverter when enabling UseSystemResourceKeys #68687
    area-System.ComponentModel, 7.0.0
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add a document describing how to triage CI test failures #68682
  • Reenable 4244 #68615
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Adding generic-math support for CLong and CULong #68673
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Use all processor groups if the process is not affinitized to a single one #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • Add retry logic to FSW tests File/Directory_Move_Multiple_From_* #68066
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • [MONO] Refactored code into marshal-ilgen and marshal-shared. #68656
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Use x64 directory if running x64 process on arm64 apphost #68583
    area-Host
  • Remove usage of *wprintf* family of functions #68237
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adding the 2-parameter xplat shuffle helpers and accelerating them #68559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fixing API compat issues between ref/src for attributes on properties #68432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Move away from exposing internal EventPipe wait handle to EventPipeEventDispatcher. #68320
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Make concurrent reads on HttpHeaders thread-safe #68115
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Update solution files to include missing deps #68668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix runtime-llvm pipeline #68495
    area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • WIP: CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Disable win-arm64 runtime tests on PRs for CoreCLR #68627
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
